title: 如何设置装备穿着后提供药水效果
author: DRAM_pxlm
txt_content: 最好是用记分板设置的

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
可以给装备物品特殊的tag，然后探测玩家相应槽位拥有该nbt的玩家给予药水效果，例如

effect give @a[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:103b,tag:{effect:"night_vision"}}]}] night_vision 12

1.12

以下高频
scoreboard players tag @a add night_vision {Inventory:[{Slot:103b,tag:{effects:["night_vision"]}}]}
effect @a[tag=night_vision] minecraft:night_vision
scoreboard players tag @a remove night_vision
